      • MOB_MAJOR_COMPACTION_REGION_BATCH_SIZE

        public static final String MOB_MAJOR_COMPACTION_REGION_BATCH_SIZE
        The max number of a MOB table regions that is allowed in a batch of the mob compaction. By setting this number to a custom value, users can control the overall effect of a major compaction of a large MOB-enabled table.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_MOB_MAJOR_COMPACTION_REGION_BATCH_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_MOB_MAJOR_COMPACTION_REGION_BATCH_SIZE
        Default is 0 - means no limit - all regions of a MOB table will be compacted at once
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MOB_COMPACTION_CHORE_PERIOD

        public static final String MOB_COMPACTION_CHORE_PERIOD
        The period that MobCompactionChore runs. The unit is second. The default value is one week.
        See Also:

      • MOB_COMPACTION_MERGEABLE_THRESHOLD

        public static final String MOB_COMPACTION_MERGEABLE_THRESHOLD
        If the size of a mob file is less than this value, it's regarded as a small file and needs to be merged in mob compaction. The default value is 1280MB.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_MERGEABLE_THRESHOLD

        public static final long DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_MERGEABLE_THRESHOLD
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String MOB_DELFILE_MAX_COUNT

      • DEFAULT_MOB_DELFILE_MAX_COUNT

        public static final int DEFAULT_MOB_DELFILE_MAX_COUNT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MOB_COMPACTION_BATCH_SIZE

        public static final String MOB_COMPACTION_BATCH_SIZE
        The max number of the mob files that is allowed in a batch of the mob compaction. The mob compaction merges the small mob files to bigger ones. If the number of the small files is very large, it could lead to a "too many opened file handlers" in the merge. And the merge has to be split into batches. This value limits the number of mob files that are selected in a batch of the mob compaction. The default value is 100. Default is 0 - means no limit - all regions of a MOB table will be compacted at once
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_BATCH_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_BATCH_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String MOB_COMPACTION_THREADS_MAX
        See Also:
